about_the_game:
Play as one of the mailroom operators at the Hotel Hermes, a prestigious hotel in the swanky part of New Olympus. Your job is to ensure mail arrives at the right place at the right time and to accomplish this you have to master the archaic and eccentric system used by the old hotel. In order to ensure mail reaches the right place, you will have to learn about the guests of the hotel, the upper management, fellow mail clerks, as well as the world at large in this puzzle role-playing game.

As you play the letters you send will change the world around you. Hopefully for the best!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x86_64
  • Processor: Intel quad-core processor running at 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel integrated or mobile graphic card, with at least 768MB of dedicated or shared VRAM and with at least Shader Model 5.0 support
  • Storage: 550 MB available space

short_description: Become a mailroom operator at Hotel Hermes and navigate an ancient mail system to deliver parcels on time. Learn about the hotel's guests and staff in this puzzle role-playing game, where your actions can alter the world. Hopefully for the best!
